pages.text:
About Us
clfyzyks
2020-06-15T02:12:16+00:00
About Us
L
egend has it that Tony Ridgway baked his first apple pie on his family’s orchard in Pennsylvania at the age of 8. His unabated love of all things cooking continues. From the earliest days of The Wurst Place, which Tony opened on 12
th
Avenue South in Old Naples in 1971, through the heyday of The Chef’s Garden and Truffles, Plum’s Café and Villa Pescatore, and continuing today in the traditions of Ridgway Bar & Grill and our sister restaurant, Bayside Seafood Grill & Bar, the focus has been on delivering a consistently excellent experience to our guests.
T
he same can be said for Sukie’s wine program. Sukie joined forces with Tony in 1979 and has ever since been cultivating a peerless knowledge base about the wine world, earning the respect and friendship of vintners throughout the United States and internationally. Her wine lists are hand-selected and regularly updated to reflect what’s new and interesting, as well as always including a broad selection of classic favorites. All regions and varietals are represented, as well as something to suit all price points. Additionally, Sukie is your go-to at Ridgway for planning your most memorable private party. Handling all the details with you from start to finish, Sukie will ensure your special occasion is the best yet.
T
ony and Sukie, today, are considered local legends for the influence they have had on the Naples restaurant scene. Ridgway Bar & Grill, in its location off Third Street South in Old Naples located two blocks from the famous Naples beaches, serves lunch and dinner daily, as well as weekend brunch. Our dining areas include our front porch facing 13
th
Avenue South, our European-style Courtyard surrounding the fountain, our beautiful garden, side patio facing the garden, and our bar and lounge and indoor dining rooms, including our private dining room. We are open year-round including all major holidays! We accommodate private parties of all sizes.
T
ony and Sukie pride themselves on this being a small family business. Many of our customers who have been dining with us for years say that the warm and welcoming atmosphere brings them back again and again. Open 365 days of the year, serving lunch and dinner daily, as well as Saturday and Sunday brunch, Ridgway Bar & Grill truly offers something for everyone.
We offer regular as well as seasonal
specials and events
, and
gift cards
are a great way to treat your favorite people to the Ridgway experience! We process gift cards within 48 hours of your order, then hand them off to the United States Postal Service, so we can’t guarantee a specific arrival date.
From the Historical Archives!
Naples Now, from December 1980
Chef’s Garden Grows Better
Trouble At Truffles
The Original Chef’s Garden on 5th

Specials and Events
clfyzyks
2022-09-17T00:56:55+00:00
Specials & Events
Ridgway Bar & Grill invites you to enjoy special events and occasions with us!
E
njoy a range of menus at Ridgway, including our comprehensive lunch, dinner, and weekend brunch offerings. On the weekends, be tempted by both lunch and brunch availability! The brunch menu includes a range of specialty cocktails, complementing our usual array of cocktail options.
Each last Friday of the month, we feature Crispy Fish as a dinner special, a throwback to Tony Ridgway’s still beloved Truffles Café. Fried Grouper, served with an Asian-inspired sauce, stir-fried veggies, and brown rice. If you’re joining us for Crispy Fish, give us a call to let us know you’re coming! This special dish takes a little extra prep.
Ridgway is open 365 days a year. Reservations are not required, but recommended, especially on holidays and at other busy times. If you wish to ensure a particular time or table, we’d ask that you please call ahead. We’re reachable daily at (239) 262-5500.
Check back to learn of any events in the restaurant, and be sure to
sign up for our email newsletters
to hear first.
Ridgway Bar & Grill is open 365 days a year for your Holiday dining
fusion-row

Contact Us
Ridgway Bar & Grill
Mailing Address: 1300 Third Street South
Physical Address: 254 13th Avenue South
Naples, FL 34102
239-262-5500
*From 3rd Street S., turn west onto 13th Avenue S. The entrance to our restaurant is about 100 feet off 3rd Street S. on 13th Avenue S. and before Gordon Dr.
Email:
contact@ridgwaybarandgrill.com
Media/Marketing/Press Inquiries:
Caroline Ridgway
If you have placed an online or phone order for a
gift card
, please know we do aim to process those within 48 hours of receipt, before sending through the United States Postal Service by standard mail, so we cannot guarantee a specific arrival date.
